smartblocks.shapes
Class ShapeFactory

java.lang.Object
  smartblocks.shapes.ShapeFactory

public class ShapeFactory
extends java.lang.Object

A factory of Shapes implemented as a singleton

Author:
David FUENMAYOR

Nested Class Summary
private static class ShapeFactory.SingletonHolder
          SingletonHolder is loaded on the first execution of Singleton.getInstance() or the first access to SingletonHolder.INSTANCE, not before.

Method Summary
 Shape createShape(EnumShapes t)
          Creates a non-initialized Shape according to the type passed as argument
 Shape createShape(Vector2D center, float radius)
          Creates a Circle with the specified attributes
 Shape createShape(Vector2D offset, Vector2D size)
          Creates a Box with the specified attributes
 Shape createShape(Vector2D offset, Vector2D[] v)
          Creates a Polygon with the specified attributes The actual offset and vertices of the polygon are calculated so it behaves as a circle whose center is: offset + vertices' centroid and radius is the radius of the vertices' bounding circle

          Returns a reference to the ShapeFactory

createShape

public Shape createShape(Vector2D offset,
                         Vector2D size)
Creates a Box with the specified attributes

Parameters:
offset - distance of the upper-left corner of this box to the origin of the world's coordinate system aka computer screen
size - width (size.x) and height (size.y) of this block
Returns:
a new Box

                         float radius)

Parameters:

radius - of this Circle
Returns:
a new Circle

createShape

public Shape createShape(Vector2D offset,
                         Vector2D[] v)
Creates a Polygon with the specified attributes The actual offset and vertices of the polygon are calculated so it behaves as a circle whose center is: offset + vertices' centroid and radius is the radius of the vertices' bounding circle

Parameters:
offset - distance of the upper-left corner of this box to the origin of the world's coordinate system aka computer screen
v - array of vertices
Returns:
